name: FlagGrabber
description: Its a fun platformer also u need to extract all on the .zip folder and open MyAwesomeness.exe to play the game (MyAwesomenes is the unity project name) DO NOT RENAME OR MOVE THE .EXE IF U DO THE GAME WILL NOT WORK...  IF YOU WANT TO MOVE THE GAME TO UR DESCKTOP THEN MOVE THE FLAG GRABBER FOLDER TO UR DESCKTOP
